Listing the way it should be - Easy.

List with us in 3 easy steps.

1

Create your draft listing

Sign up with discoverize and see how easy it is to create property listing, obligation free.

2

Choose the Right Campaign

Use campaign for more exposure of your property this also means more potential buyers.

3

List your property until sold

Host Open House For Inspections, meet and negotiate with your buyers directly, anytime

Plans and Pricing

Choose the Right Campaign.

Basic

49 / month

  • 5 professional photos
  • Feature listing on discoverize
  • Standard listing on other major websites
  • 1800x1200mm customised photo For Sale signboard
  • Community Access
  • Professional copywriter
  • Open For Inspection signage
  • Dedicated Phone Support
  • Monthly Status Reports
Select
Standard

99 / month

  • 10 professional photos
  • Feature listing on discoverize
  • Standard listing on other major websites
  • 1800x1200mm customised photo For Sale signboard
  • Community Access
  • Professional copywriter
  • Open For Inspection signage
  • Dedicated Phone Support
  • Monthly Status Reports
Select
Profesional

199 / month

  • 15 professional photos
  • Feature listing on discoverize
  • Standard listing on other major websites
  • 1800x1200mm customised photo For Sale signboard
  • Community Access
  • Professional copywriter
  • Open For Inspection signage
  • Dedicated Phone Support
  • Monthly Status Reports
